title: Pitch Deck Sprint
subtitle: Craft a compelling investor pitch deck in one focused session
outcome: A complete, investor-ready pitch deck with clear narrative, visuals, and data

agenda.title: Opening & Framework
agenda.details: What investors actually want to see

agenda.title: Problem & Solution
agenda.details: Define the problem, your solution, and why now

agenda.title: Traction & Team
agenda.details: Show your progress and why your team can execute

agenda.title: Financials & Ask
agenda.details: Funding ask, use of funds, and financial projections

agenda.title: Pitch Practice & Feedback
agenda.details: Present to your curated group and receive actionable feedback

whoItsFor: Founders preparing to raise seed or Series A
Startups with a validated product and initial traction
Entrepreneurs who need to articulate their vision clearly
whoItsNotFor: Teams without a clear business model
